pages.text: There were many different $(thing)Ages$() that changed the tools and weapons. They have different functions and areas of application.

$(l)$(n)Main Ages:$() $(br)$(li)Stone Age $(li)Antiquity $(li)Middle Ages $(li)Early Modern Age $(li)Modern Age $(li)Future$() $(br2)$(l)$(n)Side Ages:$()$(br) $(li)Edo Period $(li)Golden age of piracy $(li)Fantasy$()
